dict.acceptation: 说服；劝说；使相信；使信服；

sent.orig: How does Athena persuade the Furies to submit their case to this newly-created tribunal of Justice?
sent.trans: 阿西娜如何说服复仇三女神将本案送交新成立的正义法庭？

sent.orig: Then the Fathers tried to persuade him to stay.
sent.trans: 这时，元老们劝他留下来不要走。

sent.orig: This is the first time in China to guo biao to nongraphite to persuade the language.
sent.trans: 这是我国首次以国标的形式对企业提出劝说语标示方面的要求。

sent.orig: Can you persuade her out of her foolish plan?
sent.trans: 你能说服她放弃她的愚蠢的计划吗？

sent.orig: If he refuses, I will ask Wang Ni to persuade him. What do you think?
sent.trans: 如果他不肯，我就请王倪出面说服他，你认为如何？
